titleStmt.title: The life of John Williams, Ld. Keeper of the Great Seal, Bp. of Lincoln, and Abp. of York in the reigns of King James and King Charles the First wherein are related several remarkable occurences of those times both in church and state : with an appendix giving a just account of his benefactions to St. John's College in Cambridge / by Ambr. Philips ...
titleStmt.author: Philips, Ambrose, 1674-1749.
Hacket, John, 1592-1670. Scrinia reserata.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the University Press for A. Bosvile ...,
